snippet: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann. We are devastated by the loss of our beloved sister-in-law and aunt. Ruthann was the rock star of our family and we miss her already. Our hearts go out to Kenny, Max, Sam, and Zach. Linda Eckstein, Myra and Alon Mogilner, Shoshana, Yehuda, Josh, Joey and Gabi 1/3
lead_paragraph: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann. We are devastated by the loss of our beloved sister-in-law and aunt. Ruthann was the rock star of our family and we miss her already. Our hearts go out to Kenny, Max, Sam, and Zach. Linda Eckstein, Myra and Alon Mogilner, Shoshana, Yehuda, Josh, Joey and Gabi 1/3
